## Checklist
- [ ] My game runs without errors in the browser.
- [ ] I have NOT used any external libraries or frameworks (React, jQuery, Bootstrap, etc.).
- [ ] I have renamed my game folder correctly (e.g. `games/snake`).
- [ ] I have updated `js/games-data.js` with my game details.
- [ ] I have added a valid thumbnail image in `assets/thumbnails/`.
- [ ] I have followed the "Slot System" rules.
